comments.body: Catch all exceptions should be avoided but it is not a "blocker"

Hello @resmo 
Thank you for your feedback. Unfortunately, the 1&1 python SDK is currently throwing a generic `Exception` in `modify_server_status` method, which is why we catch it here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +534,538 @@                    action='POWER_ON',
                    method='SOFTWARE')
        except Exception as ex:
            module.fail_json(
                msg="failed to set server %s to state %s: %s" % (
